import React from 'react'; import './Footer.css'; import { FaFacebook, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin, FaPhone, FaEnvelope, FaMapMarkerAlt } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Footer = () => { return (

); }; export default Footer;
